Package cinema

Class CustomerApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinema.CustomerApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisplayUserPage, MainDisplayPage
    public class CustomerApp
extends java.lang.Object
implements DisplayUserPage
    An control class that will handle methods relating to the customer module. It will manage and control objects that are necessary to allow the customer module to search/list movies, view movie details, check seat availability and allow selection of seats, book and purchase movie tickets, and view past booking history of the customer.
    Since:
    2019-11-10
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Myat Hmu Khin, Lim Wai Leong

                                  java.lang.String mobileNum,
                                  java.lang.String email)
        Creates a new customer object
        Parameters:
        name - Name of customer
        mobileNum - Mobile Number of a customer
        email - Email of a customer
        See Also:
        Customer

      • customerExists

        public static int customerExists​(java.lang.String email)
        Checks if a customer is an existing customer
        Parameters:
        email - Email of a customer
        Returns:
        -1 if customer's email is not found in the customer database. Returns Customer ID if customer's email is found in the customer database

      • searchMovies

        public static java.lang.String[] searchMovies()
        Returns names of all movies that exist in database.
        Returns:
        String array of movie names

      • getShowtimesForMovie

        public static java.lang.String[][] getShowtimesForMovie​(int movieID)
        Searches and returns a 2D array of showtime timings for a particular movie. Is meant to help in creating Showtime objects.
        Parameters:
        movieID - movieID of target movie
        Returns:
        2D array of showtime timings for a particular movie in [[ShowtimeID,Timing],[ShowtimeID,Timing],....] format
        See Also:
        Showtime

      • searchMovieDetails

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> searchMovieDetails​(int movieID)
        Searches and returns all details of target movie. Will print No reviews has been written about this movie yet. if no reviews can be found.
        Otherwise will be in sequence of Name, Movie Type, Showing Status, Synopsis, Director, Cast, Overall Rating, Movie Age Rating, Comment, and User's Rating
        Will call searchforReview.
        Parameters:
        movieID - Unique movieID of target movie
        Returns:
        All details of a target movie stored in a ArrayList<String>.
        See Also:
        searchforReview(int)

      • searchforReview

        public static java.lang.String[] searchforReview​(int reviewID)
        Searches for review details (User rating, comment) given a target reviewID.
        Parameters:
        reviewID - unique reviewID for target review
        Returns:
        String array of size 2 containing the user rating and comment in indexes 0 and 1 respectively

      • searchOneMovie

        public static int searchOneMovie​(java.lang.String name)
        Searches for matching movieID given movie title.
        Parameters:
        name - Movie title of target movie
        Returns:
        movieID that matches target movie if target found. Else, returns -1.

      • buyTicket

        public static int buyTicket​(int showtimeID,
                            int x,
                            int y)
        Carries out purchase of ticket by customer when given showtimeID and x and y coordinates of desired seat.
        Parameters:
        showtimeID - Unique showtimeID of target showtime
        x - X-coordinate of seat
        y - Y-coordinate of seat
        Returns:
        -1 if seat is already occupied.
        1 if purchase was successful.
        See Also:
        Ticket

      • addTicket

        public static Ticket addTicket​(int showtimeID,
                               java.lang.String movietitle,
                               int isAdult)
        Creates Ticket object according to showtimeID, age of movie-goer, and title of movie given. Will also write ticket details into ticket database, as well as increment TicketSales in movie database to reflect sales of new tickets, as well as in the appropriate Movie object.
        Parameters:
        showtimeID - Unique ID of showtime selected by customer
        movietitle - Title of movie selected by customer
        isAdult - Selection between age categories. 1 for child, 2 for adult and 3 for senior prices.
        Returns:
        Newly created Ticket object.
        See Also:
        Ticket, Movie.increaseTicketSalesByOne()

      • addPayment

        public static java.lang.String[] addPayment​(java.util.ArrayList<Ticket> arr,
                                            java.lang.String paymentmode)
        Gets TID and total amount of receipt given ArrayList<Ticket> bought in this transaction by the customer, and payment mode.
        Parameters:
        arr - ArrayList<Ticket> of tickets bought in this transaction by the customer
        paymentmode - Customer's choice of payment mode. May be "Cash, Credit or PayLah!"
        Returns:
        String[2] array containing TID and total amount in respective indexes
        See Also:
        Receipt

      • searchBookingHistory

        public static java.lang.String[][] searchBookingHistory​(int custID)
        Gets all past booking history of customer, including past TIDs, payment mode, movie name, total amount paid, when given unique customer ID.
        Parameters:
        custID - Unique customer ID of customer requesting booking history
        Returns:
        2D array of all booking history in format:
        [ [TID, Payment Mode, Movie Name, Total Amount], ...]

      • addReview

        public static void addReview​(int rating,
                             java.lang.String comment,
                             java.lang.String userID,
                             java.lang.String movie_name)
        Allows movie-goer to add review to a selected movie. Will update relevant Movie object.
        Parameters:
        rating - Movie-goer's rating out of 10 in integers
        comment - Comments left by Movie-goer
        userID - UserID of movie-goer who left the review
        movie_name - Title of selected movie
        See Also:
        Movie.addReview(Review)

      • findCustomer

        public static java.lang.String[] findCustomer​(int custID)
        Fetches all data stored about a customer. Includes name, mobile number, email and all past TIDs.
        Parameters:
        custID - Unique customer ID
        Returns:
        String[] array of [name, mobile number, email, past TIDs]

      • addReceiptinCustomerDatabase

        public static void addReceiptinCustomerDatabase​(int custID,
                                                java.lang.String TID)
        Stores TID of new receipt when customer makes a purchase of tickets to keep track of past booking history.
        Parameters:
        custID - Unique customer ID
        TID - TID to be inserted into customer database
        See Also:
        Receipt

      • checkValidityShowtime

        public static int checkValidityShowtime​(java.lang.String[][] show,
                                        int target)
        Checks if showtime selected by customer exists as an object
        Parameters:
        show - 2D array of showtimes and movies like [[ShowtimeID,Timing],...]
        target - Target showtimeID
        Returns:
        1 if showtimeID is found, -1 if no

      • printRelevantShowTime

        public static java.lang.String printRelevantShowTime​(java.lang.String[][] show,
                                                     int target)
        Gets timing of showtime given showtimeID
        Parameters:
        show - 2D array of showtimeID and timing
        target - Target showtime
        Returns:
        Timing for target showtime
